title: google pixel 3xl not charging after battery ran out
content: Hello, my phone died (shut down after battery ran out), and as per usual, I plugged it on the charger. When I tried to turn it on (its said 9% charging), the screen turned black and I haven't been able to turn it on since. I left it on the charger for 1 hour and still won't turned on. the screen is still black.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
